lead_paragraph: Perhaps because of a dispute over bonuses, the Yankees have given scant attention to Alex Rodriguez’s pursuit of the home run record even while trumpeting others’ lesser milestones.

headline.print_headline: Yankee’s Quest Is Going, Going ... Unobserved
headline.main: Alex Rodriguez’s Quest Is Going, Going ... Unobserved

snippet: Perhaps because of a dispute over bonuses, the Yankees have given scant attention to Alex Rodriguez’s pursuit of the home run record even while trumpeting others’ lesser milestones.
abstract: New York Yankees are giving little notice to slugger Alex Rodriguez as he closes in on 660 career home runs to tie Willie Mays at fourth on all-time list; organization has long history of publicizing, thus monetizing, milestone achievements, but is shrinking away from Rodriguez's mark because of his year-long doping suspension and potential legal showdown that could force Yankees to pay him multimillion dollar bonuses.
